post:
**vServer.site KVM vServer**
Since a few weeks, we deploy our new G2 from KVM vServer. This hosted on Nodes, there are connected to multiple 10G to our Core Switches. Now are all vServer with pure SSD Harddrives

**General Functions**
KVM Full Virtualisation
Start, Stop, Reinstall over Control Panel
Rescue System
Add own ISO
1x IPv4 + /64 IPv6

**Datacenter**
Interwerk, Frankfurt / Main Germany

Available Images
Debian 8,9,10
CentOS 6,7
Ubuntu 16.04,18.04,19.04
Fedora, Suse...

KVM Mini: 1 vCPU Core, 1 GB RAM, 5 GB SSD, 1Gbit/s Port, 1 TB Traffic inkl.
Price: € 1,50 per month
https://cp.vserver.site/cart.php?a=add&pid=19

KVM Ultra: 2 vCPU Core, 2 GB RAM, 10 GB SSD, 1Gbit/s Port, 1 TB Traffic inkl.
Price: € 3,00 per month 
https://cp.vserver.site/cart.php?a=add&pid=10

KVM Large: 2 vCPU Core, 4 GB RAM, 20 GB SSD, 1Gbit/s Port, 2 TB Traffic inkl.
Price: € 5,99 per month
https://cp.vserver.site/cart.php?a=add&pid=7
